## UiSchemaElement type

A UiSchemaElement that displays property values in a user interface element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UiSchemaElement = {
    type: UiSchemaElementType;
    scope: string;
    label?: string;
    placeholder?: string;
    options?: UiSchemaElementOptions;
    rule?: Rule;
};
```
